item.description: The meetup is planned for 7 and Trivia starts at 8pm. Let me know if you have any questions. Here's the website to check out the menu. http://www.margs.com/
item.why: Margarita's has a great trivia night on Tuesday's. You can come for trivia and/or dinner, drinks or appetizers. Excellent chips and salsa! Lots of free parking and easy public transport right at the Wellington T Stop on the Orange Line.
item.name: Trivia Night and/or dinner at Margarita's at Station Landing in Medford
